fields.text_content:
Hi {{ connector }},

Welcome to intros.to,  a new service for powerful ‘superconnectors’ , where you can discover what happens thanks to your intros, and strengthen your network and reputation. 

To start learning about your intros, simply bcc my@intros.to next time you make an introduction.

We’ll record your introduction and you can login at anytime to view recent intros, and request feedback from the people you’ve connected.

Any questions, please drop us a line at connectors@intros.to

Thank you!

Robyn and the OneLeap team
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ connector }},


Welcome to intros.to, a new service for powerful ‘superconnectors’ , where you can discover what happens thanks to your intros, and strengthen your network and reputation.

To start learning about your intros, simply bcc my@intros.to next time you make an introduction.


We’ll record your introduction and you can login at anytime to view recent intros, and request feedback from the people you’ve connected.


Any questions, please drop us a line at connectors@intros.to


Thank you!


Robyn and the OneLeap team

fields.text_content:
Hi {{ connector_name }}

Just to let you know we’ve captured you’re intro - {{ introduction.subject }}. 

You can request feedback from the people you’ve introduced anytime at http://intros.to/introductions.

Thanks,

The intros.to Team

fields.subject: Got it!
fields.name: IntroductionRegistered
fields.description: Sent to notify user of new introduction registered

fields.text_content:
I recently made an introduction for you to {{ other_email }}.

To help me make better intros for you, please let me know if this was a good one.

Follow this link and say what you thought.  Takes a minute max.

{{ link }}

Thanks,

{{ connector_name }}

Are you a connector? Follow your introductions by activating your account at http://intros.to.
